titleStmt.title: A song set by Sam. Akeroyde ; engrav'd by Tho. Cross.
titleStmt.author: Akeroyde, Samuel, ca. 1650-ca. 1706.

notesStmt.note: First line of text reads: The rays of dear Clarindas eyes.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
The Wing number A822 is cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.), because this is an engraved item.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
